alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 4:58PM MST until January 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
